title: Diamond Blossom Bangle - Vaajra Kankanam
materials: Brilliant Cut). Features Hyderabadi setting techniques for enhanced brilliance and durability.
features: Modern open-cuff bangle design featuring a floral motif at the center, embellished with round-cut and baguette-cut diamonds in a cluster setting. The open design allows for comfortable wear while highlighting the intricate diamond arrangement. Incorporates a minimalist aesthetic while maintaining a touch of traditional South Indian elegance. The claw setting is done by expert artisans to secure the stone.
colors: Rose Gold and White Diamonds. The rose gold provides a warm contrast to the brilliant white of the diamonds.
occasions: and modern celebrations. A stunning addition to your office wear or a chic party attire.
description: This diamond bangle offers a blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds sparkle brilliantly, catching the light from every angle. The rose gold complements all skin tones, and the comfortable open-cuff design makes it easy to wear. The piece embodies contemporary style while drawing inspiration from traditional South Indian jewelry aesthetics.
